name: The Little Fish's Struggle
description:
Welcome to The Little Fish's Struggle.

Alexander Dannemand and myself (Nicolai Hansen), have made a game where the purpose is to survive from a lot of deadly fish as long as possible. You do this by using the 3D movement space you have available under water to hit a ball and kill deadly fishes. By killing the bosses (only sharks in current build) can you advance to the next level, which sends bigger waves at you. Have fun.
